comments.content: 這很明顯就是你沒有朋友是用英文跟你聊天的

I don't understand. This forum is for people who are interested to improve their command of English, or are passionate about it. You are not only demotivating others, but also downright disrespectful~

Mind you, a lot of people here are students and will easily be influenced by your attitude.

take easy, what you met was just discrimination and had nothing to do with English.

I think the charm of the language is that you can communicate with other person, to understand the foreign culture.

being able to communicate is good enough. maybe the next step you should focus on is to use words more accurate ly, concisely and fluently. believe me, thats not easy if you try to read formal article.

If only use English for argue with others then it's not fun anymore:) Try to find out some communicate groups which use English.
U can find your enthusiasm back❤️❤️
